title: 1.2 Building Python Nodes with rclpy
description: Following our exploration of ROS 2's foundational architecture, this chapter shifts focus to practical implementation. We will learn how to develop functional ROS 2 nodes using rclpy, the Python client library for ROS 2. Building custom nodes is essential for extending robotic capabilities, integrating new sensors, and implementing control algorithms.
